about_the_game:
Wrong Bullet is an innovative chill shooter where each game offers a unique experience thanks to randomly generated levels and arsenal. Players explore a constantly shifting world, battling waves of enemies and collecting resources in the form of golden shards. These shards can be spent to unlock new characters, each adding unique elements to gameplay, enriching your gaming experience.

Key Features:

  • Randomly Generated Levels:

    Each game presents a new map with unique enemy and item placements.

  • Variety of Weapons:

    Collect randomly dropped weapons that alter your playstyle and strategy.

  • Golden Shards:

    Extract resources from enemies to expand your arsenal and unlock new characters.

  • Unique Characters:

    Each character has distinct abilities and attributes, changing how levels are approached.

  • Rich Gameplay:

    Dynamic battles and a constant sense of surprise due to unexpected twists and random game elements.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game


Wrong Bullet is an innovative chill shooter where each game offers a unique experience thanks to randomly generated levels and arsenal. Players explore a constantly shifting world, battling waves of enemies and collecting resources in the form of golden shards. These shards can be spent to unlock new characters, each adding unique elements to gameplay, enriching your gaming experience.

Key Features:

  • Randomly Generated Levels:

    Each game presents a new map with unique enemy and item placements.

  • Variety of Weapons:

    Collect randomly dropped weapons that alter your playstyle and strategy.

  • Golden Shards:

    Extract resources from enemies to expand your arsenal and unlock new characters.

  • Unique Characters:

    Each character has distinct abilities and attributes, changing how levels are approached.

  • Rich Gameplay:

    Dynamic battles and a constant sense of surprise due to unexpected twists and random game elements.
name: Wrong Bullet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Wrong Bullet is a captivating chill shooter that unveils an ever-changing world with random weapons scattered everywhere, accompanying your bloody campaign against enemy heads. Collect golden shards from them to unlock characters, discovering even more facets of gameplay.
